
be advmod once
time case upon
time det a
once nmod time
be expl there
be nsubj Jack

thirsty nsubj Jack
thirsty cop be
thirsty advmod very

find nsubj Jack
find aux could
find neg not
find dobj water
time case for
time det a
time amod long
find nmod time

day nummod one
see nmod day
see nsubj Jack
jug det a
see dobj jug

narrow cc but
jug det the
narrow nsubj jug
narrow cop be
narrow advmod too

think nsubj Jack
plan case of
plan det a
think nmod plan

drop nsubj Jack
drop dobj pebble
jug case into
jug det the
drop nmod jug

rise nsubj water
rise compound up

drink nsubj Jack
water det the
drink dobj water

happy nsubj Jack
happy cop be
happy advmod very
